text: The 1973 European Cup Final was a football match. It was held at the Red Star Stadium, Belgrade, on 30 May 1973. Ajax of the Netherlands defeated Juventus of Italy 1–0. A goal from Johnny Rep made Ajax to win. ==Route to the final== Ajax Ajax Ajax Ajax Round Juventus Juventus Juventus Juventus Opponent Agg. 1st leg 2nd leg Opponent Agg. 1st leg 2nd leg Bye First round Marseille 3–1 0–1 (A) 3–0 (H) CSKA Sofia 6–1 3–1 (A) 3–0 (H) Second round 1.
